description:
In the quarter finals of the summer tournament, the Mifune Dolphins face the powerhouse Touto Boys, with Hikaru and Daigo as their battery. 
On the other hand, the Touto Boys are already planning for the semi-finals and decided to preserve Mayumura Michiru`s left arm, and send their 2nd pitcher Komatsu on the mound.
After not seeing Michiru start, Urabe gets angry, thinking they`re being completely underestimated.
However, despite being the 2nd pitcher, Komatsu throws intensely fast balls, impressing on Daigo and Tashiro how much talent and how rich a roster Touto has.
Source: crunchyroll
